name: GRIDHAMDAnswerOptionsVSQ17
title: GRID-HAMD Answer Options ValueSet
description: ValueSet including Q17 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.

concept.display: Any recognition of depressive symptoms, with or without attribution to any cause, e.g., “I’m depressed because my partner always argues with me.
Denies illness but accepts possibility of being ill, e.g., “I don’t think there’s anything wrong, but other people think there is.
Complete denial of having any illness, e.g., “I’m not depressed; I’m fine.
